text: CLICK HERE if you are having a problem viewing the photos on a mobile device In 2004, the Church of Scientology embarked on a top - secret project to find a new wife for Tom Cruise after his divorce from Nicole Kidman and the end of his relationship to actress Penelope Cruise, according to a report by Vanity Fair. The project involved an elaborate auditioning process in which actresses were brought in to try out for a film, then asked a series of questions that included : “ What do you think of Tom Cruise? ” In an interview Wednesday, a former Scientology member, who said he served on Cruise ’ s Scientology security detail, claims that one of the actresses who auditioned to be Cruise ’ s “ second dynamic ” was Scarlett Johansson.
